comment.body:
> [eventi](#comment_6_1DcDDitsjFJohvwonPmpibRChmA7uGxqL7): Looks like that was intentional, because it isn't "multiuser safe"
> https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/commit/36d3268cf7de35ea51d423f0f2767e903b5fb077
> They have a point, if you imagine using this sort of setup in a proxy, but for myself I wish it'd remember who a site was cached for and allow that person to delete

Seconded. Just enabled multiuser to test it out and will probably disable it again as soon as I want to delete pages, this is a major dealbreaker.
Maybe make it a toggle somewhere, somehow?
